channel.title: Where is this?
channel.description:
[code]Starting special edition PimpScape BETA (C) KillaMess, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]
Its not in my shops.cfg because i replaced it with my old one and it didnt work...

item.title: Where is this?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

got it.

Read full topic

item.title: Where is this?
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

What’s wrong is one your items in in your config file doesnt match how much your itemhandler reads. Meaning:
item = LOOKLIKETHIS 0 0 0 0 0 0
item = ERRORITEMLOL 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

It could be more or less of course. But thats basically whats wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Where is this?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Why don’t you post what you added I think it will help you realise what you did wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Where is this?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I think it was because i added a item that wasnt in item.cgf thats what the errors are pointing to

Edit: Nope…

Read full topic

item.title: Where is this?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:15, topic:143094”][quote author=Zandia link=topic=195961.msg1755181#msg1755181 date=1189746039]
Look on the lines it specifys in the error and see what they call. The problem may not be in ItemHandler or Server but whatever there using in there.

For example if your item class is calling the config on that line you know its a problem with your config file.
[/quote]

Thanks zandia we’ve clarified this Frell now just needs to learn what an ArrayIndedOutOfBounds Exception is.[/quote]
I cant wait till you learn what STFU means.

Read full topic
